title: Not Even A Real Links Post, Just A Blatant Ad
summary:
Key ideas:
- There is a charity event going on where whoever gets the most unique donors of $10 or more wins a prize supposedly valued at $250,000.
- MIRI is a group that works on ensuring a positive singularity and friendly AI. 
- MIRI is currently close to winning the top place in the charity event.

Key learnings:
- Donating to MIRI can help support their work on ensuring a positive singularity and friendly AI.

Key questions:
- Should I consider donating to MIRI to help support their work?
